content: Finland’s latest weapons in the fight against the coronavirus are named Kossi, E.T. and Miina. The three sniffer dogs are being put to work at Helsinki’s Vantaa airport, using their unrivalled sense of smell to detect passengers carrying the disease.
translations: ita:Le ultime armi della Finlandia nella lotta contro il coronavirus si chiamano Kossi, E.T. e Miina. I tre cani da fiuto so
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
